DOC.brief_summary: The event-related potentials may be different in patients with Takotsubo cardiomyopathy than in patients without Takotsubo.
DOC.brief_title: The Role of Emotional Stress in Patients With Stress-induced Cardiomyopathy
DOC.detailed_description: In patients with Takotsubo diagnosed by coronary angiography, the event-related potentials are investigated and compared with a control group, which consists of subjects without Takotsubo.
DOC.criteria: Age >18 years Written informed consent Takotsubo cardiomyopathy for group 1. ACS for group 3. Psychiatric diseases Impaired versus, non compliant patients, heart disease for group 2. Takotsubolike syndrome.
